system.descriptor: Stalling for time, causing distractons through speaking. Requires sharing common language with opponent.
system.uses: Opposed Test vs Target Willpower/Scrutiny. Success means target is distracted by you or bemused into inaction. Doesn't neccisarily mean they are completley inactive or unaware in the face of obvious danger or harm against them.
